# Minimum Length Masyu

This is a [Masyu](https://puzz.link/rules.html?masyu) variant - the loop must turn on each black pearl and must travel straight for at least N cells (not counting the pearl cell itself); the loop must go straight on each white pearl and must travel straight for at least N-1 cells (not counting the pearl cell itself) and turn after exactly N cells on at least one side of the white pearl. (If N=1, this is just a regular Masyu.)  
Each region has single value N. There are 4 distinct values of N used in this puzzle. Two regions sharing an edge may not have the same value for N.

Click the image to solve on Penpa+.
[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2022/minimumLengthMasyu1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
